S

setIndex(int) - Method in class boolShell.formulars.Reference
Sets the index of the reference Only positive Integer values which can point on existing Formular in the FormularBuffer are valid
setNumber(int) - Method in class boolShell.formulars.Variable
Sets the number of the variable Only positive Integer values are valid
show(String) - Static method in class boolShell.Commands
SHOW-command Prints the Formular represented by the given Reference
SHOW - Static variable in interface boolShell.Commons
Command-indicators and error-indicator
simplify(FormularBuffer, String) - Static method in class boolShell.Commands
SIMPLIFY-command Simplifies the logical boolean Formular and saves the new Formular in the FormularBuffer
SIMPLIFY - Static variable in interface boolShell.Commons
Command-indicators and error-indicator
simplify(Formular, boolean) - Static method in class boolShell.Recursion
Simplifies a given Formular using boolean rules
size() - Method in class boolShell.FormularBuffer
Returnes the size of the buffer as amount of saved Formular
subst(FormularBuffer, String, String, String) - Static method in class boolShell.Commands
SUBST-command Substitutes a Variable in a Reference with a given other Formular and saves the new Formular in the FormularBuffer
SUBST - Static variable in interface boolShell.Commons
Command-indicators and error-indicator
subst(Formular, Variable, Formular, boolean) - Static method in class boolShell.Recursion
Substitutes the Variable check in a Formular form1 by another Formular form2 by searching it recursive in a tree-strucutr
SyntaxException - Exception in boolShell
BoolShells Exceptions Prints error-messages with a default entering message Error-messages are declared at Commons
